entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
